Title: ​Additional Reserve Instance Capacity for Windows Azure Web Sites Preview
Summary: We’ve seen really great customer usage and feedback on the new Windows Azure Web Sites Preview since the initial release June 7th.   Today, we’re happy to announce we’…
Content:
We’ve seen really great customer usage and feedback on the new Windows Azure Web Sites Preview since the initial release June 7th.   Today, we’re happy to announce we’ve more than doubled the number of available Windows Azure Web Sites Reserve Instances in our East US, West Europe, and North Europe datacenters. 

If you haven’t had a chance to try Windows Azure Web Sites now is a great time!  You can learn more and sign up for the preview here.
